summary: Comments allow programmers to leave notes inside of code.
details: Comments are simply ignored by the compiler.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    # This is a single-line comment. %0A    nop;%0A%0A    // This is also a single-line comment. %0A    nop;%0A%0A    /* This is a multi-line comment. */%0A    nop;%0A%0A    /*%0A     This is also a multi-line comment, but is badly formatted. %0A     */%0A    nop;%0A%0A    /*%0A     * This is a nicely formatted multi-line comment. %0A     */%0A    nop;%0A}
